cookies.cookies title: we use cookies to enhance the functionality of the website.you can disable cookies in your browser settings.
cookies.content text 1: A cookie is a small text file that is stored in a dedicated location on your computer, tablet, smartphone or other device when you use your browser to visit an online service. A cookie allows its sender to identify the device on which it is stored during the period of validity of consent, which does not exceed 13 months.
cookies.content text 2: These cookies are required for optimum operation of the website, and cannot be configured. They allow us to offer you the key functions of the website (language used, display resolution, account access, shopping bag, wish list, etc.), provide you with online advice and secure our website against any attempted fraud.
cookies.content text 3: These cookies are used to measure and analyse our website audience (visitor volume, pages viewed, average browsing time, etc.) to help us improve its performance.By accepting these cookies, you are helping us to improve our website.
cookies.content text 4: These cookies are used for Off White advertisements displayed on third-party websites, including social media, and are tailored to your preferences and to help us measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns. If you deactivate these cookies,advertising (including ours) will continue to be displayed as you browse the Internet, although they will not be specific to your personal interests, and will therefore be less relevant.
cookies.content text 5: These cookies allow us to provide you with online or in-store recommendations of products, services and content that match your expectations and preferences. By accepting these cookies, you are opting for an enriched and personalised experience.
cookies.cookies to personalize the grbpwr experi: cookies to personalize the grbpwr experience

update_location.message: You are currently shopping on the {currentCountry}. When changing countries/regions your shopping bag will be emptied. Are you sure you want to proceed?

measurements-descriptions.chest: Measured chest flat across garment, from under-arm to under-arm
measurements-descriptions.shoulders: Measured horizontally across garment, from shoulder-seam to shoulder-seam
measurements-descriptions.bottom-width: Measured bottom width flat across garment
measurements-descriptions.length: Measured from center-back neck down to bottom of garment
measurements-descriptions.inseam: Measured from crotch down to bottom along inseam (inside leg)
measurements-descriptions.sleeve: Measured from center back neck, including shoulder to bottom of hem

meta.description: latest ready-to-wear menswear, womenswear, and accessories
